mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `notice_board` ORDER BY notice_board_no DESC LIMIT #{cnt} , 10
SELECT B.*,A.admin_name FROM `notice_board` AS B INNER JOIN `admin_member` AS A WHERE B.notice_board_no = #{notice_board_no} AND B.admin_no = A.admin_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `notice_board`( notice_board_title, notice_board_contents, notice_board_regdate, notice_board_moddate, notice_board_writter, notice_board_hit ) VALUES( #{notice_board_title}, #{notice_board_contents}, now(), now(), #{notice_board_writter}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `notice_board` WHERE ${stype} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{stext},'%') ORDER BY notice_board_no DESC LIMIT #{cnt}, 10
SELECT count(*) FROM `notice_board` WHERE ${stype} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{stext},'%')

select notice_board_no, notice_board_title from `notice_board` where notice_board_no=(select max(notice_board_no) from `notice_board`
where notice_board_no < #{notice_board_no});

select notice_board_no, notice_board_title from `notice_board` where notice_board_no=(select min(notice_board_no) from `notice_board`
where notice_board_no > #{notice_board_no});
